Optimizing Food Inspections in Chicago

A Final Project for CS109a at Harvard University

View on GitHub
In the pages below, we walk through the process and results of our work on Optimizing Food Inspection Outcomes in Chicago. We are grateful to our TF Taylor Names for his advice.

  • Conclusion
  • Future Work
Optimizing Food Inspections in Chicago was created by Luke Farewell , Jake Gober , Samuel Green , and Jeremy Welborn .
